history.content:
<md>Hello,\
\
My name is Sean Chen, and I am an undergrad researcher in the Robotics and AI Laboratory in BAIR. My team is developing a method to train robots to enact user intent through natural human interactions. Our goal is to help paraplegic patients regain dexterity and control in their daily life by allowing them to control a robotic arm via Brain-computer interface.\
\
We are conducting a user study between Sept 9-Sept14 that will take about 1hr and for which you will be compensated with a $10 Amazon Gift Card. The study involves use of gaze to control a robotic interface.\
The lab space we are conducting the study in is maintained to school, state, and CDC standards for COVID-19 safety. \
\
If you would like to participate in our exciting work, please contact 00schen@berkeley.edu</md>
history.subject: Control Robots with Your Gaze: HRI User Study
